abstract: An arbitration panel rejected the actor’s claims against the bank and ordered him and his associates to pay legal fees and penalties.
snippet: An arbitration panel rejected the actor’s claims against the bank and ordered him and his associates to pay legal fees and penalties.
lead_paragraph: Will Ferrell played an over-the-top newscaster in the Hollywood hit “Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy.” Now the comedian is back in the news, as he lost a big arbitration case against JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Will Ferrell Bombs in Case Against JPMorgan

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Evelyn M. Rusli
